instructions: Open your phone's Settings and navigate to Cloud and accounts > Samsung Cloud . You may be prompted to sign in using your Samsung account or sign up for a new account. Tap the three dots in the top-right corner and select Settings from the menu that appears, then tap Sync and auto backup settings . Under the Sync tab, scroll down and slide the toggle switch to On for each type of data you want to stay synchronized. Tap Auto Backup , then scroll down and slide the toggle switch to On for each type of data you wish to back up, such as Calendar , Contacts , or Gallery . Go back to the Samsung Cloud main menu and tap you name at the top to see details for how much storage is available and how much you re using. To manually backup your data, scroll down and tap Back up this phone .
